Name: Lawnmower Game: Zombies
About the game: Story: This new Lawnmower zombie game is driving simulation game, where player need cut grass, drive as much as can to unlock new mowers. Also player need avoid deathly zombies. When zombie hit player it will decrease player health, but also zombie will be killed. Lawnmower has fuel consumption and player can play for 4 different mowers. New mowers can be unlocked when player have driven enough. Also game contains weather and day/night cycle and of course lot of grass to cut. Game contains also hidden objects which gives player steam achievements Features: - 4 different mowers which can be unlocked when enough driven - unlocked mowers - weather system - Deathly following zombie enemies, which can kill player. - day/night system - lot of grass
